head.title: Treasury Set To Sell Bills During Week

hedline.hl1: Treasury Set To Sell Bills During Week

block.p: The Treasury's schedule of financings this week is confined to today's regular weekly auction of three- and six-month bills.
By the close of the New York cash market on Friday, traders said, the rate on the outstanding three-month bill was 5.63 percent and a six-month bill was 5.92 percent.
The Treasury's schedule of financings this week is confined to today's regular weekly auction of three- and six-month bills.
By the close of the New York cash market on Friday, traders said, the rate on the outstanding three-month bill was 5.63 percent and a six-month bill was 5.92 percent.
The following taxable and tax-exempt fixed-income issues are scheduled for pricing this week:
TAXABLE
ONE DAY DURING THE WEEK
Crown Castle International Corp., $250 million of senior notes due 2010, B3/B/---. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Ford Motor Company, multi billion dollar of 30 year global bond. Bear, Stearns & Co. and Salomon Smith Barney.
Mutual Group Ltd., $150 million of senior notes, Baa2/BBB+/---. Prudential Securities.
Qatar (State of) $1 billion of global bond, Baa2/BBB/ ---. Goldman, Sachs & Co.
Republic of Uruguay, $200 to $250 million of global securities with maturities to be 10 or 20 years, Baa3/ BBB-/---. Chase Securities.
(Source: MCM Corporate Ratings: Moody's Investors Service/Standard & Poor's Corp./Duff & Phelps Credit.)
TAX EXEMPT
TUESDAY
California, $350 million of general obligation bonds. Competitive.
Nevada, $104 million of general obligation bonds. Competitive.
WEDNESDAY
Rhode Island & Providence Plant, $57.2 million of general obligation bonds. Competitive.
ONE DAY DURING THE WEEK
Connecticut, $400 million of general obligation bonds. Merrill Lynch & Co.
Foxborough, Mass., $70 million of stadium infrastructure improvement bonds. Morgan Stanley Dean Witter.
Illinois Health Facility Authority, $60 million of debt securities for condell medical center. Banc One Capital Markets.
Jefferson Parish, La., Home Mortgage Authority, $50 million of single family mortgage revenue bonds. George K. Baum & Co.
Maine Governmental Facilities Authority, $51.9 million of debt securities. Paine Webber Inc.
Maricopa County, Arizona Pollution Control, $144 million of revenue bonds for southern california edison. Bear, Stearns & Co.
Milwaukee, Wis., Airport, $85 million of revenue bonds. Salomon Smith Barney.
Ohio Water, $75 million of debt securities. Merrill Lynch & Co.
State of New York Mortgage Authority, $67.8 million of debt securities. Paine Webber Inc.
Sunny Mae, $105 million of debt securities. J.P. Morgan Securities.
University of Alabama Health, $160 million of debt securities. Merrill Lynch & Co.
